1613200.name: Waves of Steel Soundtrack
1613200.description:
The original soundtrack to Waves of Steel, now on Steam! With epic orchestral instrumentation, enlivened by modern electronic elements, it's sure to put you in the mood to man battle stations and sail into combat!

All tracks from the game are featured here, from the title fanfare through to the many combat tracks. All of them have been mastered and looped for your listening pleasure. Whenever new music is added to the game, it will also be inserted into this album!

Tracks are provided in MP3 format. A "Waves of Steel OST" folder will be downloaded containing all music files.
